text.tspan: Total shortfall from a poverty line of $1 a day (before tax), 1970 to 2024
This is the amount of money that would be theoretically needed to lift the incomes of all people in poverty up
to $1 per day. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. Income here is
